#labels Featured
== Changelog ==
=== 0.1.5 ===
 * cg2dot: issue #15: root node now can just have arbitrary number of subcalls, we dont make any suppositions (that are wrong in some cases) about their number any more. 
 * cg2dot: issue #12: -i/--ignore option.
 * cg2dot: optimized filter_inclusive_time a bit, using thresholds inclusively.
 * cg2dot: better error handling, introducing CgParseError.
 * added shebang lines.
 * svn: fixed script eol styles and executable flags.
 * removed unnecessary error masking.

=== 0.1.4 ===
 * added a new xdot-pygoocanvas.py utility which works more rapidly than the original xdot

=== 0.1.3 ===
 * cg2dot: issue #11: Change edge style
 * cg2dot: minor improvements in the command line usage
 * cg2dot: root node is now called root instead of -1
 * added cg2ubigraph: issue #10: Add ubigraph visualization for fun

=== 0.1.2 ===
 * cg2dot: minor colorizing issue in the --aggregate=none mode
 * cg2dot: issue #8: Crash on shutdown functions 
 * added a new cgsplit utility

=== 0.1.1 ===
 * cg2dot: issue #7: Make aggregation optional

=== 0.1.0 ===
 initial release
